newsitem.title: USA: Peak Technologies gets acquisition offer.
newsitem.headline: Peak Technologies gets acquisition offer.

text.p: Peak Technologies Group Inc said Monday that it had received a friendly and unsolicited cash offer to acquire 100 percent of its outstanding capital stock from a company substantially larger than it at a premium to the current market price.
Peak shares closed up 1-7/8 at 10-1/2 Monday.
The company said it has appointed William Blair & Co as its advisor and a committee of independent members of the board to evaluate the offer.
It said no assurances can be given that a transaction will take place and said it would make no further announcement regarding the offer until a conclusion has been reached.
